summary: this mod adds mods to the skill trees, making many of them very good, mainly making the perks 2 times to 4 times to 6 times to 8 times stronger, not god modding for most of them.
descriptionHtml:
this mod adds mods to the skill trees, making many of them very good, mainly making the perks 2 times to 4 times to 6 times to 8 times stronger, not god modding for most of them.

find me on steam! 
inc99.9999

and my mods on steam!
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
Elders skill perk tree mods.
i have made many skill tree mods, all of them you can get, and if you want a spicific skill tree edited then just ask.
also, the mods are not very godmoddy, so dont worry to much.
do not have both \"unlimited enchantment effects\" and \"upgraded enchanting on at the same time.
list of my mods.
Upgraded Enchanting Perks
Upgraded Marksmen Perks
Upgraded OneHanded Perks
Upgraded Conjuration Perks
Upgraded Restoration Perks
Upgraded Speech Perks
Upgraded Pickpocket Perks
Upgraded Smithing Perks
Upgraded Lock-Picking Perks
Upgraded Sneak Perks
Upgraded Destruction Perks
Upgraded Two-Handed Perks

if you have any issues with any of the mods please comment and tell me.
please subscribe :D
author: Elderblade910
